sourcesContent:
import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { api } from '../utils/api'; export default function PublicView() { const [teams, setTeams] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { api.get("/api/teams") .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setTeams(data.sort((a, b) => b.points - a.points)) ); }, []); return ( <> {/* Hero Section */}
ROTARACT DISTRICT ORGANISATION 2025-26
ROTARY INTERNATIONAL DISTRICT 3206
HOSTED BY: ROTARACT CLUB OF GCT COIMBATORE | ROTARACT CLUB OF COIMBATORE IGNITE
{/* Points Table */}

üèÜ Leaderboard

{teams.map(team => ( ))}
Team Gold Silver Bronze Bonus Points
{team.name} {team.gold} {team.silver} {team.bronze} +{team.bonus} {team.points}
GOLD: 3 Points
SILVER: 2 Points
BRONZE: 1 Point
); }
